hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to tolvaptan. Manufacturer advises caution or adjust tolvaptan dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tolvaptan .  Manufacturer advises caution or adjust  tolvaptan  dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to topotecan. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   topotecan .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to toremifene. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   toremifene .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to trabectedin. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   trabectedin .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the concentration of trametinib. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the concentration of   trametinib .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to trastuzumab emtansine. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to moderately increase the exposure to trazodone. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   moderately   increase   the exposure to   trazodone .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises avoid or monitor adverse effects.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   triamcinolone .  Manufacturer advises avoid or monitor adverse effects .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to ulipristal. Manufacturer advises avoid if used for uterine fibroids.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   ulipristal .  Manufacturer advises avoid if used for uterine fibroids .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to upadacitinib. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vemurafenib. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vemurafenib .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to venetoclax. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   venetoclax .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose—consult product literature .

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   venlafaxine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to increase the exposure to verapamil. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   verapamil .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Lopinavir is predicted to affect the exposure to voriconazole and voriconazole potentially affects the exposure to lopinavir. Manufacturer advises monitor efficacy and toxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lopinavir   boosted with ritonavir   is predicted to   increase   the concentration of   voxilaprevir .  Manufacturer advises avoid .
